mapper.select: SELECT plan_id as planId, member_id as memberId, destination, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, created_at as createdAt, upt_date as uptDate FROM foreign_plans WHERE plan_id = #{planId}

SELECT plan_id as planId, member_id as memberId, destination, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, created_at as createdAt, upt_date as uptDate FROM foreign_plans WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT schedule_id as scheduleId, plan_id as planId, day_number as dayNumber, schedule_date as scheduleDate, created_at as createdAt, upt_date as uptDate FROM foreign_schedules WHERE plan_id = #{planId} ORDER BY day_number

SELECT activity_id as activityId, schedule_id as scheduleId, place_name as placeName, latitude, longitude, visit_time as visitTime, duration, activity_type as activityType, notes, created_at as createdAt, upt_date as uptDate FROM foreign_activities WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId} ORDER BY visit_time
